text: ellā ōrēā manuṣyanṟeyuṁ munniluṁ pinniluṁ avannāyi niyēāgikkappeṭṭa mēlnēāṭṭakkāruṇṭ. allāhuvinṟe kalpana prakāraṁ avaravane śrad'dhiccukeāṇṭirikkunnu. allāhu oru janatayuṭeyuṁ avasthayil māṟṟaṁ varuttukayilla; avar taṅṅaḷuṭe sthiti svayaṁ māṟṟunvare. ennāl allāhu oru janatakk valla duritavuṁ varuttānuddēśiccāl ārkkuṁ at taṭukkānāvilla. avanekkūṭāte avarkk rakṣakanumilla
